name: Shepherd (CHz)
description:
Gravitational avoid 'em up made for GAMES MADE QUICK??? 1½. Go for a high score! Or don't, I'm not the boss of you.

Your score goes up based on how close you are to everything else: live dangerously and score more! If you hit something, you'll stop scoring points for a little bit.

Physics and scoring will depend on when your browser decides to redraw, so maybe don't take tryharding this thing too seriously.

Menu controls: arrow keys to change options, [Z] to start

Game controls: arrow keys to move, [Z] to restart, [X] to quit

Source code is lying around over here: https://bitbucket.org/CHz16/shepherd
